relation: University Police is always around however they are not the greatest.
Dining services are improving this year greatly. There are only 2 dining halls however but one of them is more family style dining while the other is more fast food style.
Although not many dorms, they are easily found and easy to go through.
Many students say that the classes are easy but it is major dependent. Professors expect a large amount of work to be done by each student and expect the best quality as well.
Huge transition into the school. Focus on your studies greatly and take advantage of the opportunities given.
Various great opportunities given at hand to students. Although Delhi is small, it has great things to offer with great staff and people willing to help you.
pageTitle: SUNY College of Technology at Delhi Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {170588=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 156846=The campus looks amazing and very clean. I will be taking my tour in May., 55980=I have no idea how the campus was in the previous years, but as I right this review it is 2011. When coming to SUNY Delhi you need to have your wits in tack. There are many great, friendly students at this college,but be on the look out for those students who only want to have a good time. They will surely led you astray. Even though it may seem dull, the campus has a lot of fun activities weekly and it keeps the college life fresh and fun. Dorms are good, while others are just decent. Applying early gives your first picks on the good dorms.}
textBeforeTable: 06/17/2009 Reviewer is Accepted here and planning to attend soon. Reviewer has been to campus. 12 out of 15 people found this review useful. 2 people found this inaccurate. 1 of 42 Taylor from Middletown, NY Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. You could win a free scholarship. textAfterTable: Don't stereotype people or places. Keep an open mind and you might just find you like, or even love, it here. Bang for the buck Tuition keeps going up so its hard to say we are getting a 'Bang for the buck'. Its a great school and it is cheaper than most because it is a SUNY school. Am enjoying being here I love the rural atmosphere. I grew up in the country so I love going to college in the country. Am learning a lot The professors are knowledgeable. I am in the IT Management major and I have learned a lot, even though I came in knowing a lot about the IT world to begin with. Login to rate or flag the reviews Amanda 01/04/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 5 out of 5 people found this review useful. 3 of 42 Categories Comments
